name: 98 Blocks
description:
The game is a fusion of the classic tetris and the popular "put three together" games. With special advantages when you put more then three blocks together, you will find different challenges a way to spending time with fun!

Another unusual feature is that the game takes place in a board with 98 spots disposed in an isometric view, which makes it look diagonal. The borders then makes the fitting a little more difficult, but giving you a greater challenge.

Are you ready for the challenge?
